name: Ingram Micro Holding Corporation
summary: Ingram Micro Holding Corporation is a global distributor of information technology products and services, headquartered in Irvine, California. Founded in 1979, the company operates worldwide, providing technology solutions, cloud services, and logistics to a broad range of business partners. Ingram Micro went public again in October 2024 and is recognized as one of the largest technology distributors by revenue and global reach.
